name: VanGo Fast!
description:
This is VanGo Fast!

Where your road is the world and your house is a van. Go around the levels and win you mates while trying to customize your car, learning how to move it and get better in wild scenarios.

Start winning today with Van Go Fast, and be the first in a race around the world.
We have hundreds of levels, and you can keep the first places and the best times in all of them (◉ω◉)!
Drive your 60's Van on an amazing trip around the world easily with your finger and go around the world in less than others do.
Features:
♪ ♫ ♪ Music that will accompany you in your dreams!
ᶘᵒᴥᵒᶅ Everything kawaii you can have
༼ ಢ_ಢ ༽ Scenarios that will make you cry with joy (* ^ _ ^ *)
🐉 Enemies at the end of the stages
💒⛩🕍🗽🏯 Beautiful landscapes
🚗🚕🛺🚒🚛🚜 Updates with more vehicles
💞🎗🐷 Love, understanding and tenderness

Gather your clothes and desire to travel the world, and accumulate money to paint your van as you like, customize scenarios and create competitions and levels.

Enjoy this epic adventure and travel with us to a happier world on your beautiful sixties van.

Playing Van Go Fast is free for life, although there are payment possibilities if you want to save time in the game.

Have fun with this Van Go Fast game wonder and enjoy leaving your house with a single touch on your cell phone screen. Bom voyage!
